xurumin.title: Xurumin - Discord Bot
xurumin.description: A Brazilian bot that plays music (with playlists!). Also it has memes, image and video generator commands, profile etc..

podcast.title: Podcast App UI
podcast.description: The UI of a podcast app created for the purpose of study. A Home Page, Categories, Player, etc was designed.

readability.title: Readability Test
readability.description: A minimalist website where users can test the readability of their texts. Works in Portuguese. Made with ReactJS and TypeScript.
